actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate certain persons holding title to the surface of certain lands in an amount equal to ten percent of all royalties received by the United States in connection with coal extracted from such lands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate persons holding title to the surface of qualified homestead or other lands in an amount equal to 10 percent of all royalties received by the United States in connection with coal extracted from such lands.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate certain persons holding title to the surface of certain lands in an amount equal to ten percent of all royalties received by the United States in connection with coal extracted from such lands.
